channel.title: Using Hamachi/ Running Server With Hamachi
channel.description:
Owner: 1. Download hamachi at [url=http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php]http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php[/url]
2. Turn it on
3. Click on triangle at bottom
4. Click Create new network
5. Put in a room name and pass
6. Start Server
User: 1. 1. Download hamachi at [url=http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php]http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php[/url]
2. Turn it on
3. Click on triangle at bottom
4. Click Join Existing Network
5. Type in the room name and pass the owner set
6. Go to moparisthebest.com
7. Put in any user and pass
8. Put in the owners ip
9. Log in and play[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 04:05:15 PM[/size][hr]This is a plain adn simple guide for ppl that dont know how to use hamachi

item.title: Using Hamachi/ Running Server With Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @russiandude212 russiandude212
item.description:
@russiandude212 wrote:

Owner:

  1. Download hamachi at http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php

  2. Turn it on

  3. Click on triangle at bottom

  4. Click Create new network

  5. Put in a room name and pass

  6. Start Server

User:

    1. Download hamachi at http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php

  2. Turn it on

  3. Click on triangle at bottom

  4. Click Join Existing Network

  5. Type in the room name and pass the owner set

  6. Go to moparisthebest.com

  7. Put in any user and pass

  8. Put in the owners ip

  9. Log in and play[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 04:05:15 PM[/size][hr]This is a plain adn simple guide for ppl that dont know how to use hamachi
